import React from 'react' import { Dialog, DialogTitle, Grid, TextField, DialogActions, DialogContent, Button, } from '@material-ui/core' import axios from 'axios' import accounting from '../../../funcs/accounting' export default function AddFixedCostDialog(props) { const [state, setState] = React.useState() const handleChange = (e) => { setState({...state, [e.target.id]: e.target.value}) } const addFixedCost = async () => { const { due_day, amount, from, to, frequency, notes } = state let fixed_cost = { due_day, amount, from, to, frequency, notes } let res = await axios.post('/users/add-fixed-cost', {fixed_cost}) console.log(res.data) } return (
Add a fixed cost
) }
